question.text:
Select the correct statement from the following given statements.

(I) Properties of tissues are present in the constituent cell and arise as a result of interactions among them.
(II) Properties of cellular organelles are present in the molecular constituents of the organelles and arise as a result of interactions among them.
(III) Living organisms are system capable of responding to external stimuli.

options.text: I, II and III are correct

solution.text: Cellular organelles characteristics are not present in the molecular components of the organelle but form as a result of interactions among the molecular components making the organelle. Living organisms are self-replicating, evolving and self-regulating interactive systems capable of responding to external stimuli. Properties of tissues are not presenting the constituent cells but arise as a result of interactions among the constituent cells.
